whoWeAre.label: IDENTITY
whoWeAre.title: A Collective Born from Voices
whoWeAre.body: Genesi Nova is an independent a cappella choir founded in Istanbul in 2024. Voices from diverse backgrounds unite around a shared musical vision.

philosophy.label: PHILOSOPHY
philosophy.title: Music, Ritual and Connection
philosophy.body: Performing is not a show for us — it's a ritual. Every rehearsal, every concert is a silent contract between us and the listener.

approach.label: APPROACH
approach.title: Sound Architecture Beyond Genres
approach.body: From Turkish folk music to contemporary arrangements, from jazz to experimental vocal — we redraw the boundaries of what voices can do.

collective.label: COLLECTIVE
collective.title: Not Individuals, One Voice
collective.body: Each of us carries a different color. But when we step on stage, those colors merge into a single sound — the voice of Genesi Nova.
